name: Stay Away From Me (Shrit1401)
description:
Well, Heyy I am again  with another game, well this is a 2d multiplayer game made with Photon and a  lot of networking code, This is made for GMTK game jam which topic was Joined Together so two-player joined with one rope and it's it

Movements

WASD or arrow keys - moving around

space  key - to dash
